greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence related to NOR bracketings.
comment: Conjecture: Starting with n=1, a(n) is the main diagonal of the array defined as T(1,1) = 1, T(i,j) = 0 if i<1 or j<1, T(n,k) = T(n,k-2) + T(n,k-1) -2*T(n-1,k-1) + T(n-1,k) + T(n-2,k). [From _Gerald McGarvey_, Oct 07 2008]
formula: a(n) = Sum_{j=0..n} (-1)^(j-1)*C(2n-j-1, n-j)*C(2(j-1), j-1). - corrected by _Peter Bala_, Aug 19 2014
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(j=0,n, (-1)^(j-1)*binomial(2*n-j-1, n-j)*binomial(2*(j-1), j-1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 19 2014
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 09 2005
